title: in summary, star guardian and project have both been lack luster compared to the older ones.
body:
wonder what other popular skin lines will riot fuck up this year.

stop "trying" to make these new skins different from the rest because you clearly have no idea how to do it. givin the mass feedback from both of them. stop trying to fix stuff that aint broke.
just make the skins normal and fit in the with predecessors. 

what you DO need to fix that IS broke is your balance team and matchmaking. leave the popular skinlines alone.
